name: Errazking´s The Seuck collection Nº1
description:
Here are ten of the timeless Errazking classics exclusively for Commodore 64.

  • T-UFO A stench of shooter
  • META 14 Reaches the finish line in this fast-paced cycling race
  • Eidothea Delve deep into the body and save the patient
  • Retro Reto PAN! Save the world in this beat em up
  • Matador 16 An anti-bullfighting manifesto, yes, really
  • Nero Must Die! Try to catch the villain by playing a bounty hunter
  • Super Ace 1942 An attempt to recreate the famous arcade with SEUCK
  • Main Ninja Be a ninja and fight the forces that want to take over the world
  • The Hunter The acclaimed winner of one of TND's seuck compos
  • Antarta A race with a penguin? Yes

I hope this sample leaves no doubt that SEUCK is one of the best tools for Commodore 64, like it or not.

Special thanks to Richard Bayliss of TND for their music collaborations and support for the developer scene.
